item.description:
Hey folks! well the weather is looking very cooperative for climbing at Quincy Quarries this coming saturday 11/22. daytime temps mare predicted to be in the high 30s, and while this might seem chilly, the C-wall quarry area will be pleasant and warm at the base.

the C wall quarry is south facing and on sunny days the wall heats up and makes for a nice comfortable day of climbing. C wall has grades for all abilities.

Go here for directions...

http://www.rockclimbi...

...or follow the link.

group.name: The Arleen Virga Blackstone Rock Climbing Meetup

item.name: Quincy Quarries 10 AM Saturday,November 22
